title: New: s u i t e – Trust
body:
Haunting, moody vocals and an 80’s inspired synth section; Canada’s **s u i t e** may not be your average popstar but what he perhaps lacks in internet savvy, he more than makes up for in quality.

With the repeated hook _“what do you love / what do you trust / why won’t you tell me just one secret?”_ echoed throughout, new track _Trust_ is a dense and methodical affair, with more than a hint of The XX about it. Check it out below.
